talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$General Douglas$
I have so much to take care of, so if it's not urgent, please come back later.
(Talk to Jasmine at the Academic Station in Saint Haven)

$Geraint$
I'll protect the Descendent of the Ancient, you just go on your way.

$King Cassius$
Warm-hearted person.
So young but so brave....

$Warrior Xian$
...Has time already passed this fast?
Now, {user_nick}, try to do some sightseeing in Saint Haven and enjoy yourself~

$Academic Jasmine${sound:npc_SH_Jasmin_sp_02.ogg}
You have arrived.
I was waiting for your report.

$Academic Jasmine$
So what happened?
Did you rescue the Prophet?

$Academic Jasmine$
...I see. I didn't know Geraint has sustained injuries, that wasn't in any of the records.
If the Prophet is at the center of the Nest, you won't be able to take her right away.

$Academic Jasmine$
According to the records, the Nest will be lifted. I think Geraint will lift the nest on Saint Haven and go somewhere, or move the Prophet's location....
I think it's best if you wait until then.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>She isn't very talkative, so I'm not sure.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Jasmine$
It would be better if we can find out the location of the Monolith.... I don't think it'll be that easy.
Argenta isn't very friendly towards humans and she already went to Lotus Marsh.
So, how's Geraint doing?

$Academic Jasmine$
Oh, really~ dragons are so difficult to handle? They say they are protecting the world, but in fact, they have no mercy for humans.
...Only if Velskud becomes the person he is at our world, things would be a lot better. Do you know what happened to Velskud?

$Academic Jasmine$
Umm.... Couldn't this be an opportunity to persuade him?
He may be hiding somewhere, so you better look for him.

$Academic Jasmine${sound:npc_SH_Jasmin_sp_07.ogg}
Didn't you say you saw him fall down with your own eyes? Try to think about where he might be at geographically after taking that kind of injury.
First... it might be better to see if there is anyone with the information at the Royal Palace.

$Geraint$
I'll protect the descendent of the Ancient. You just go on your way.

$King Cassius$
Warm-hearted person. So young but so brave....
(Connect to the Academic Station and report to Jasmine on current situation)

$General Douglas$
I have so much to take care of, so if it's not urgent, please come back later.
(Communicate with Jasmine at the Academic Station in Saint Haven)

$Warrior Xian$
...Has the time already passed this fast?
Now, {user_nick}, I'll have to go and do some other work.
See you later. Haha.

$Warrior Xian$
Where did Triana go?
Did she receive another task.... Hmm~
(Xian is mumbling)

$Academic Jasmine${sound:npc_SH_Jasmin_sp_07.ogg}
It would be better if you met Velskud.... Where could he be?
First... it might be better to see if there is anyone with the information at the Royal Palace.

$King Cassius$
I've received the report, {user_nick}, kind person.
You're so brave, loyal to me and to the kingdom even at such a young age.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>They are working under the Bishop's order?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
And the other adventurers....
seem to be doing something by the order of the Bishop.
I'm worried, since we lost many men during this war and the General is upset....

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You shouldn't trust the Bishop too much.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
My uncle is busy with the work in the Royal Palace and the General is busy with the soldiers' treatment.
Thank goodness the Bishop is taking care of other business. He's a good courtier, isn't he...?

$King Cassius$
...I'm so tired of people slandering others....
I hope you won't do that.
(Cassius waves his hand sadly. It doesn't seem like he wants to hear anymore.)

$King Cassius$
If you want to do something for your kingdom, go and meet the Bishop.
...No, he has many who are helping him, so it might be better if you do something else.
There is the Adventurers' Guild or the General... or.... anyway, there are a few.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you know the whereabouts of the Black Dragon?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
{user_nick}, cute girl.
Do you have something to ask me?
Your face looks worried.

$King Cassius$
Whereabouts of the Black Dragon? ...Isn't the Black Dragon dead?!
I heard that it was completely eliminated...?
(I made him feel uneasy. Cassius starts to tremble and tries to find the General.)

$King Cassius$
General!! General~ the Black Dragon is dead, right? Right?
It's safe here... isn't it...?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Did you find any traces of the Black Dragon?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas${action:Talk}
Hmm... I just heard that the rescued Prophet is only sleeping. But we did the best we could. So let the King handle what to do about the Prophet.
Anyway, you all did a great job.

$General Douglas$
Hmm? Black Dragon? ...I received a report that it was injured and it fell from the sky after fighting with the Gold Dragon....
We didn't find any traces of it at the Dark Overlord Keep.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Contamination at the Foothills of Black Mountain?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas$
Anyway, maybe because of the blood the Black Dragon spilled while falling from the sky above the Dark Overlord Keep, contamination at the Foothills of Black Mountain is getting worse.
This isn't good since we don't have the manpower to think of that right now.

$General Douglas$
I mean at the Deserted Woods. On top of the problem at the Dried Marissa Spring, everyday is a mess.. When the blood from monsters flowing, the land gets contaminated, and we won't be able to harvest on that land....

$General Douglas$
Yes, the Dark Overlord Gate is located at an elevated position.
Due to geographical reasons, the Deserted Woods, located right by the gate, cannot escape the contamination.

$General Douglas$
It's a hectic situation trying to tie the loose ends from the war and checking the status of the soldiers.
If you are free, please give us a hand.
(Douglas moves around hastily.)
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Mission Starts Now I
journal.contents:
Connect to the Academic Station and tell Jasmine the recent activities.

Saint Haven → Academic Station
journal.todo_msg: Connect to the Academic Station and report to Jasmine.

journal.title: Mission Starts Now II
journal.contents:
Go to the Saint Haven Royal Palace and meet someone who might have some information.

Saint Haven Royal Palace → King Cassius
journal.todo_msg: Go to Saint Haven Royal Palace to gather information.

journal.title: Mission Starts Now III
journal.contents:
King Cassius is leaning on the General. Need to talk to the General to find out what's been happening.

Saint Haven Royal Palace → General Douglas
